decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) (England) 2015 (or any order revoking or re-enacting that order) no further extension(s) or additional structures/buildings shall be erected within the curtilage of the site.
description:
Planning Reference: 01081/8/P1
Appeal Reference: APP/F5540/W/18/3203993

Retrospective application for alterations to existing 0utbuilding (C3 -Residential) including an increased roof height, installation of a roof light and an additional window and insulation to external walls

Planning Reference: 01081/8/LAW1
Appeal Reference: APP/F5540/X/18/3204623

Certificate of Lawfulness for erection of a rear roof extension with hip to gable conversion and two roof windows to front elevation
